\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{\cdots } & \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{(P^{-2},Y)} & \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{(P^{-1},Y)} & \color{rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}{(P^{0},Y)} & \color{rgb,255:red,108;green,0;blue,240}{(X,Y)} \\
	{\cdots } & {(P^{-2},I^0)} & {(P^{-1},I^0)} & {(P^{-1},I^0)} & \color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{(X,I^0)} \\
	{\cdots } & {(P^{-2},I^1)} & {(P^{-1},I^1)} & {(P^{-1},I^1)} & \color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{(X,I^1)} \\
	{\cdots } & {(P^{-2},I^2)} & {(P^{-1},I^2)} & {(P^{-1},I^2)} & \color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{(X,I^2)} \\
	& {\vdots } & {\vdots } & {\vdots } & \color{rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}{\vdots }
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}, from=1-2, to=1-1]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}, from=1-3, to=1-2]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,230;green,0;blue,11}, from=1-4, to=1-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dotted, from=1-5, to=1-4]
	\arrow[dotted, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-5, to=3-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}, from=3-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=4-1]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=5-2]
	\arrow[from=4-3, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=4-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=5-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=4-5, to=4-4]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,20;green,44;blue,255}, from=4-5, to=5-5]
\end{tikzcd}
